thread.title: Carl Henderson
thread.title_full: Home Zone Furniture reviewed by Carl Henderson

author: Carl Henderson
title: Carl Henderson
text: I had excellent experience at the Cedar Hill Store. Eric my seller person was very patient with me. I look at sectional for a week before made decision your price can be beat in the Dallas area. Only thing wish your store could do better is deliver my sectional sooner had to wait week for purchase is to long.
